episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_0100_10:
Step right up, and try your hand at fishing for
Water-type Pokémon! It’s pretty challenging!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_0400_10:
Sure thing! The Pokémon are happy to get more
Berries to eat! Fish away!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_0500_10:
Hmm... Yes, there’s a trick to these sorts
of games...
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_0700_10: Yes! Can I give it a try?
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_0800_10: All I have to do is drop the line right here...
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1000_10: And there it is! It’s a bite!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1200_10:
Wow, that was cool! You made that look
so easy!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1400_10: As I said before, there’s a trick to it.
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1500_10:
Back in Alola, I used to go fishing a lot with my
twin sisters, so you could also say it’s one of
my talents!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1600_10:
My parents fish for a living, so I’ve been fishing
all my life.
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1700_10:
Oh, I know! Why don’t you come visit me in
Alola sometime?
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1800_10:
Then, we could go fishing for wild
Pokémon together!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_1900_10:
I can teach you all about how fun fishing can be!
Enjoying the scenery as you wait for something to
bite... Oh, it’s just fantastic!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_2100_10:
Oh, did you know? One of the prizes here is a
fishing rod!
episode_event_sm_solo/4001_1001_2200_10:
Why don’t we check that out once we get our
tickets, then?
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0100_10:
Well, look at that—a talent competition! And it’s
Korrina facing off against Fantina, the dancer!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0200_10: Here we go! Let’s give it all we’ve got!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0400_10: Based on your cheers, the winner is... Fantina!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0500_10:
Aw, shucks. I’m sad we lost, but that dance was
amazing, Fantina!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0600_10:
Thank you! Your acrobatic performance was such
a delight to see!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0700_10: We’re looking for our next challenger! Any takers?
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0800_10:
Oh-ho! How about you, over there? Your Pokémon
looks like it’s ready to dance the night away!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_0900_10: Why not compete with us with your dancing?
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1100_10:
Yes, it does look like Marowak wants to dance...
and I want to dance, too!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1200_10:
Let’s do it! We’ll turn up the heat with
our performance!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1300_10: Oh, fantastic! You are very strong!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1400_10: I know you’ve beaten us. It’s your win!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1500_10:
It’s an honor to win against a famous dancer
like you!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1600_10: Now, time to keep this battle going!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1700_10:
Now that we’re blazing with energy from our
dance, we must fan these flames and begin a
Pokémon battle immediately!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1800_10: I can’t say no to that! It would be my pleasure!
episode_event_sm_solo/4002_1001_1900_10:
Let’s turn the heat back up on this crowd with
a Pokémon battle!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0100_10: Welcome to the Pokémon Sumo arena!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0200_10:
Ho! Now this is what I was looking for!
Pokémon Sumo!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0300_10:
The rules are easy! You just gotta push your
opponent out of the ring!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0400_10:
Interesting. So for this arena, the audience makes
up the boundaries of the ring?
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0700_10:
Hmm... So even here on Pasio, there are kids like
that, huh.
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_0800_10: Allow me to be your next opponent!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1100_10:
I see... Looks like this old man won’t be as easy to
beat as we thought. Sneasel, can you still do this?
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1200_10:
What an exciting development! Old Hala will make
you holler!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1300_10: It’s our loss. Sneasel, are you OK?
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1400_10:
Ah, I see there was nothing to worry about with
you, young man.
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1500_10:
You understand the true meaning of competing
with others to get stronger.
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1600_10:
Here ya go! We’re givin’ these tickets out to all
our participants!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1700_10:
The prize for exchanging these is the chance to
join another round of Pokémon Sumo!
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_1900_10:
Well, since we have these tickets, would you like
to go another round with me?
episode_event_sm_solo/4003_1001_2000_10: Sure. We’re going to win this time!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0100_10: The Masked Royal! I’m so glad to see you here!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0300_10: Wow! It’s the Masked Royal and Crasher Wake!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0400_10: Oh my! Are they about to battle?
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0500_10:
Crasher Wake... I’m a man who lives up to my
fans’ expectations.
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0600_10:
If you don’t mind, why don’t we find a place
where we can hold a Battle Royal?
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0700_10: Yeaaah! I’d be more than happy to battle ya!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0800_10:
But for a proper Battle Royal, aren’t we a bit short
on contestants?
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_0900_10:
That’s true... A Battle Royal is a four-way
Pokémon battle.
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_1000_10:
OK! For our third contender, how about...you,
over there! And as for the last Trainer...
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_1200_10:
I’ve decided to make this Battle Royal the main
event of our street fair!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_1300_10: Sawyer! You take that last spot!
episode_event_sm_solo/4004_1001_1500_10:
I won’t let you say no! In fact, I even have a
mask ready for you to use!
episode_event_sm_solo/4005_1001_0100_10: We will now commence the Pasio Battle Royal!
episode_event_sm_solo/4005_1001_0200_10: Is this your first time in a Battle Royal?
episode_event_sm_solo/4005_1001_0300_10:
Discovery! New experiences! Adventure! It’s all
yours if you want it! Let’s have fun!
episode_event_sm_solo/4005_1001_0400_10:
Fight to the very end with all you’ve got! May the
strongest Trainer be victorious!
